verses.verse: Thus <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H7999>finished:<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> all the <S%H6944>things<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6944>dedicated;<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments,<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> he among the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of the <S%H4480>city<s%> <S%H5892><s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> assembled <S%H6950>themselves<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> was in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And they brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> these did the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> bring <S%H5927>up.<s%>

Also <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> could <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H4487>numbered<s%> for <S%H4480>multitude.<s%> <S%H7230><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the most <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944><s%> place, even <S%H413>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the cherubims: <S%H3742><s%>

For the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> spread <S%H1961>forth<s%> <S%H6566><s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof <S%H4480>above.<s%> <S%H4605><s%>

And they drew <S%H748>out<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of the ark, that the <S%H7218>ends<s%> of the <S%H905>staves<s%> were <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1687>oracle;<s%> but they were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>without.<s%> And <S%H8033>there<s%> it <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

There was <S%H369>nothing<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7535>save<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> therein at <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt.<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> were come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place: <S%H3588>(for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that were <S%H4672>present<s%> were <S%H6942>sanctified,<s%> and did <S%H369>not<s%> then <S%H8104>wait<s%> by course: <S%H4256><s%>

Also the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> which were the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> with their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H251>brethren,<s%> being <S%H3847>arrayed<s%> in white <S%H948>linen,<s%> having <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> and <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> and <S%H3658>harps,<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the east <S%H4217>end<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> them a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2690>sounding<s%> with trumpets: <S%H2689>)<s%>

It came even to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as the <S%H2690>trumpeters<s%> and <S%H7891>singers<s%> were as <S%H259>one,<s%> to make <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6963>sound<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H1984>praising<s%> and <S%H3034>thanking<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and when they lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> and <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music,<s%> and <S%H1984>praised<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> saying, <S%H3588>For<s%> he is <S%H2896>good;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever:<s%> that then the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> even the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

So that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> by reason <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H6051>cloud:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
